DOC.brief_summary: This study assess efficacy 12-week treatment darifenacin increase warning time , time first sensation urgency voiding , patient OAB .
DOC.brief_title: A 12-Week Study Evaluate Efficacy Darifenacin Increase Warning Time Patients With Overactive Bladder .
DOC.criteria: Three symptom OAB ( urge incontinence , frequency urgency ) least six month prior Visit 2 . Patients capable independent toileting able independently complete patient diary . Patients use anticholinergic drug contraindicate Evidence severe liver disease Patients clinically significant urinary gynecological condition Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply .
